ComicInfo.Title: Complications Continue; Shouldda Been There!!; The Do-Gooders!; A New Beginning; City of the Blind
ComicInfo.Summary:
Complications Continue: After being late to a gaming session, Sara reveals to the group that she has a new boyfriend, but he doesn't yet know she is a gamer.
Shouldda Been There!!: Sara learns that her character, Thorina, was killed in the previous gaming session when she was absent.
The Do-Gooders!: In an attempt to secure a new henchmen the group manages to burn down an entire town.
A New Beginning: Pete and Stevil have to create new characters after their previous characters were killed in the previous adventure.
City of the Blind: The group creates a gang of thieves for their latest adventure.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 17:14:44. [CVDB70332] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-14 06:54:40. [Issue ID 89651]
ComicInfo.Characters: B.A. Felton,Sara Felton,Bob Herzog,Dave Bozwell,Brian van Hoose
ComicInfo.Teams: The Knights of the Dinner Table,Black Hand Gaming Society
